summary: Verified Dashboard.jsx and MasterData.jsx refactoring - All extracted components render correctly. Dashboard page loads with MetricCard, SDCStatusMetrics, BurndownDashboard, ProcessStages, Deliverables, and SDCDirectory components. MasterData page loads with Job Roles tab visible. JobRoleForm extracted component works properly in dialog.

issues: Minor React hydration warning: <span> cannot be child of <option> in work order selector dropdown - cosmetic only, doesn't affect functionality. Same as iteration_14.

passed_tests: SDCStatusMetrics component renders with SDC counts
BurndownDashboard component renders with work order progress
Deliverables card renders with distribution summaries
SDCDirectory component renders with accordion sections
User menu dropdown shows HO-specific links
User menu - Master Data link present
User menu - Resource Calendar link present
User menu - User Management link present
Job Roles tab visible and clickable
Work Orders tab visible and clickable
JobRoleForm component renders correctly in dialog
JobRoleForm shows calculated cost per student
frontend_verified: Dashboard.jsx reduced from ~1620 to 498 lines - components work
Dashboard imports from @/components/dashboard (MetricCard, DeliverableItem, SDCStatusMetrics, BurndownDashboard, DashboardSkeleton, SDCDirectory)
All extracted dashboard components render without errors
JobRoleForm extracted component works in dialog
MasterDataSkeleton component used for loading state
No duplicate component declarations causing build errors

dashboard_components: SDCDirectory.jsx - SDC directory with accordion sections
NewWorkOrderForm.jsx - New work order creation form
master_data_components: JobRoleForm.jsx - Job role creation/edit form with CATEGORY_RATES export
MasterDataSkeleton.jsx - Loading skeleton for master data page

critical_code_review_comments: Refactoring completed successfully - Dashboard.jsx reduced from ~1620 to 498 lines
MasterData.jsx reduced from 2741 to 2551 lines by extracting JobRoleForm and MasterDataSkeleton
All component imports are properly structured in index.js files
CATEGORY_RATES exported correctly from JobRoleForm for use in MasterData
Minor hydration warning exists in BurndownDashboard select dropdown (same as previous iteration) - not a regression
seed_data_creation: Created test user with HO role for authentication
context_for_next_testing_agent: Major refactoring verification complete. Dashboard.jsx now uses 7 extracted components from /app/frontend/src/components/dashboard/. MasterData.jsx uses 2 extracted components from /app/frontend/src/components/master-data/. All components render correctly and functionality is preserved. Minor React hydration warning exists in BurndownDashboard dropdown (cosmetic, not affecting functionality).
